/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and creating a lens flare in the image.
